activities: Customer Portfolios receives marketing data from each Customer Portfolios client and manages this data in a marketing database system that is used only by that specific Customer Portfolios client. The data that Customer Portfolios receives is from each Customer Portfolios client, not the end-consumer. The end-consumer provides their data to each respective Customer Portfolios client. End-consumers do not provide information directly to Customer Portfolios. Each Customer Portfolios client uses their respective marketing database, which Customer Portfolios hosts and maintains for the Customer Portfolios client, for the Customer Portfolios client’s marketing purposes to the Customer Portfolios client’s end-consumers
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Yes, we have first name, last name, mailing addresses, email addresses, phone numbers. Yes, we do have some spreadsheet data sources
